_comment: The data store will be separated into two parts, users and youtube search results.

users._comment: Each user will be given an entry within users. The expected values of each field will be the returned token from OAuth for 'twitter-token', the user's name in 'name', and the user's previous search in 'previous-search', if it exists. The 'twitter-token' field will be required as it means that OAuth was successful
users.name: John Smith

youtube-search._comment: this will be the cache of the application as it will contain the video titles and ids of the locations that have already been searched by users.

Quincy Market._comment: Each location will have up to 25 results with their titles and ids stored in the database.
Quincy Market.title: Boston Quincy Market
Faneuil Hall & Quincy Market Tour - Boston MA

New York.title: New York City Vacation Travel Guide | Expedia
